```{julia}

"a" + "b"
```

```{julia}
#| expand: true

[
    (; thunk = () -> "no problem here"),
    (;
        thunk = function ()
            return [
                (;
                    thunk = function ()
                        return [(; thunk = () -> error("a nested thunk error"))]
                    end,
                    options = Dict("expand" => true),
                ),
            ]
        end,
        options = Dict("expand" => true),
    ),
]
```
